substats: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

conesNew.notes: Best in slot and easy to use. SPD Boots + Talent alone brings Dan to 157 SPD.
Specialized 40% Crit Rate build. Dan's high hit count on Skill can reliably proc the effect. Requires good rotation and turn manipulation.
